name: Left for Dad
description:
A game for the 6th round of the Black Market Brawl OCT! 

Follow our good friends CRUSTACEY, CAPTAIN McGRUFF, HUMDARRL, AND the other ones, as they go on a fun, completely safe adventure through the Din! 

Cheer them on in their wacky escapades! 

Be moved to tears by the effort of everyone who coded and drew art for this! 

Date that sexy sheep with the cool hat, you know the one! 

And please, above all, REMEMBER-!

(This interaction project is part of an Original Character Tourament Contest and none of the context within the project will make any sense. For those outside of the Black Market Brawl OCT, this game will not be coherent for you. We apologize for any troubles this may cause.)

----------------- Credits ------------------

Written by Dream Weaver and PoolNoodle

Ren'py programming by Squingy and Dream Weaver

Character, Background, and GUI Art by Kazar

Music by Ryu Umemoto

Special thanks to RustyToast, Pr0m3th3us, Ninja, AxelKongm, Aegis, and Sal.TheSalty.
